title: Will Bengals be back? Aaron Donald's future; Stafford's no-look pass; Super Bowl parties; Matt Gay
itunes:title: Will Bengals be back? Aaron Donald's future; Stafford's no-look pass; Super Bowl parties; Matt Gay
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and former Super Bowl Champion Shaun O'Hara examine the state of the Cincinnati Bengals and explore the likelihood that they'll be back in the Super Bowl. Then they break down Matthew Stafford's no-look pass to Cooper Kupp; they're joined by Scott Pioli and he shares his experience at Super Bowl parties and explains how soon coaches and GM's get back to work after a Super Bowl; and they share their thoughts on the future of Aaron Donald. They finish up being joined by Los Angeles Rams kicker Matt Gay and he gives insights into what the last 48 hours have been like; he shares what it was like to kick the game winning field goal against his former team, the Tampa Bay Buccaneers; and then he explains how important it is to live in the moment.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
